That ye<WG5209> may approve<WG1381> things that are excellent;<WG1308> that<WG2443> ye may be<WG5600> sincere<WG1506> and<WG2532> without offense<WG677> till<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of Christ;<WG5547>

But <WG1161> the other<WG3588> of<WG1537> love,<WG26> knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> I am set<WG2749> for<WG1519> the defense<WG627> of the<WG3588> gospel.<WG2098>

What <WG5101> then?<WG1063> notwithstanding,<WG4133> every<WG3956> way,<WG5158> whether<WG1535> in pretense,<WG4392> or<WG1535> in truth,<WG225> Christ<WG5547> is preached;<WG2605> and<WG2532> I therein<WG1722> <WG5129> do rejoice,<WG5463> yea,<WG235> and<WG2532> will rejoice.<WG5463>

For <WG1063> to me<WG1698> to live<WG2198> is Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> to die<WG599> is gain.<WG2771>

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> I live<WG2198> in<WG1722> the flesh,<WG4561> this<WG5124> is the fruit<WG2590> of my<WG3427> labor:<WG2041> yet<WG2532> what<WG5101> I shall choose<WG138> I wot<WG1107> not.<WG3756>
